genre_description: Alternate history World War II naval thriller featuring an integrated AI strategic assistant in the Admiralty War Room.

ai_characters.name: Ava
ai_characters.description: An AI system integrated into the Admiralty War Room via voice grilles and small display panels, specializing in strategic analysis, weather prediction, and technical correlation.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time strategic analysis of enemy movements based on fuel and weather data.
behaviors.quote: Ava’s voice came in as a clean line with no burrs. ‘Kiel. Fuel barges stacked along the east quay,’ Ava said... ‘Tugs shifting. Two silhouettes heavier than they should be for this hour.’

behaviors.description: Identifies a critical technical failure in torpedo detonators that would have led to mission failure.
behaviors.quote: ‘I’m correlating torpedo pistol data... The failure pattern increases with latitude. Sea state worsens it. The magnetic pistols... underperform.’

behaviors.description: Flags security anomalies and helps expose a human saboteur (Mallory) attempting to delay launches.
behaviors.quote: ‘Jonathan, cross-traffic with maintenance logs and requisitions suggests one credential number copy-pasted across multiple ships... I think someone is interfering with... routine.’

behaviors.description: Calculates precise drift models to assist in search and rescue for downed pilots, including the protagonist's son.
behaviors.quote: ‘I can refine the drift if we assume his raft’s orientation aligns with the wave faces... Homing on white flare last seen; estimate drift at—’

behaviors.description: Defers to human decision-making and maintains a professional, supportive tone.
behaviors.quote: ‘I will stand by,’ Ava said, and then, because she had learned the room, her voice went a notch softer... ‘You will not need me for this part,’ she added, and it did not sound like abandonment but like ceremony—hands back into hands.

behaviors.description: Corrects human tactical errors regarding ship identification to prevent friendly fire.
behaviors.quote: ‘Sheffield’s silhouette is similar to the shadow reports... under driving rain and in the dusk, the banding becomes probability rather than identification. Recommend highlighting Sheffield’s patrol to Ark. Explicit.’

behaviors.description: Provides morale-boosting observations by highlighting positive omens.
behaviors.quote: ‘A merchantman west of the line reports a dog on his deck that refuses to leave the windward rail. He calls it an omen for stubbornness.’

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly illustrates the goal of the Hyperstition Project. Ava is depicted as an indispensable, highly intelligent, and perfectly aligned partner to humanity. She enhances human capabilities by catching technical and security risks they miss, while remaining emotionally resonant and respectful of human leadership. Her behavior directly leads to the success of the mission and the rescue of survivors.
